markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9+"
    pfs=""
>
[Messenger's Ring](/Equipment.aspx?ID=448)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 613 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This silver signet ring changes to match the insignia of a lord or organization you serve (or your own face, if you serve no one else). It grants you a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks and lets you cast [_message_](/Spells.aspx?ID=190) as an arcane innate spell at will.

<document level="2" id="action-263" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Messenger's Ring
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 613 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Messenger's Ring (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 613 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 13,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ring grants a +3 bonus and can be activated in an additional way.

<document level="2" id="action-264" />
name: Messenger's Ring
